CustomField.description: This field is utilised for Unified cases only. When the case is being created, agent needs to manually select a Case Enquiry sub-type value based on the interaction with customers
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is utilised for Unified cases only. When the case is being created, agent needs to manually select a Case Enquiry sub-type value based on the interaction with customers
CustomField.label: Enquiry Sub Type
